instructions.mission:
## Goal
Extract UI patterns from Calvin work, document them, and evaluate Chelekom component library for Maestro.

## Context
- Calvin had UI improvements (unclear what exactly)
- Created css_linter (analyzes CSS usage)
- Created ui.compact & ui.add_expandable scripts (transform UI)
- Chelekom documentation exists (CHELEKOM_NOTES.md)
- Need to consolidate UI knowledge

## Questions to Answer
1. What specific UI improvements did we do in Calvin?
2. Are they captured anywhere? Scripts? Docs?
3. Should we use Chelekom components in Maestro?
4. How do Chelekom components compare to current approach?

## Tasks
- [ ] Review Calvin project git history for UI work
- [ ] Check if ui.compact/add_expandable apply Calvin lessons
- [ ] Review CHELEKOM_NOTES.md thoroughly
- [ ] Evaluate Chelekom for Maestro (pros/cons)
- [ ] Document decision and rationale
- [ ] If yes to Chelekom: Create installation/migration plan
- [ ] Extract any missing patterns from Calvin work

## Resources
- ~/dev/agents/docs/chelekom/CHELEKOM_NOTES.md
- ~/dev/forks/css_linter (analysis tool)
- ~/dev/forks/maestro_tool (transformation scripts)
- Calvin project git history
